email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per metric ton. The laycan is October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.75 sounds more reasonable. However, we’d need the laycan to be October 18-23 to align with our schedule. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to October 18-23. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement at $48.75 per metric ton, laycan October 18-23, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. Thanks for your help! Cheers, John
